headline: Block Names Anthony Eisen, Co-Founder of Afterpay and CEO of Reshop, to Board of Directors
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/OAKLAND, Calif., February 06, 2025--Today Block, Inc. (NYSE: XYZ) announced that Anthony Eisen, Co-Founder of Afterpay and CEO of Reshop, has joined its Board of Directors.
